stimulusHtml: Vermeer’s genre painting of Woman Holding a Balance and Rachel Ruysch’s still life painting Fruit and Insects convey meaning in a similar way by
choicesHtml: including written text that provides a commentary on the depicted subject matter
using depictions of everyday objects to communicate a moral message
depicting allegorical scenes in the service of political propaganda
combining stylized animal and plant forms to create a primarily decorative effect
